label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_004
content:
## 2024-03-25 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 82
- Active: 82
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 11
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm

- Standard: 26
- Placebo: 28

### Efficacy By Arm

- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.5
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 40.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 11.1
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) Mean: 289.0
- Multimodal Six MWT (meters) SD: 60.0

- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.3

- AE ID: PM-AE-0471, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: standard
- AE ID: PM-AE-0460, Description: constipation, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: false, Treatment Arm: multimodal

- PD ID: PM-PD-0423, Description: Rescue medication log incomplete for 1 subject, Severity: minor

### Events

### Notes
